name: numasec
description: AI-powered security testing through MCP. Find vulnerabilities, understand root causes, and fix code — all from your IDE. 20 security tools (nmap, nuclei, sqlmap, Playwright browser), CVSS/CWE/OWASP standards, orchestrated by an AI agent.

tools.name: numasec_assess
tools.description: Full autonomous AI-driven security assessment — plans attack, picks tools, finds vulnerabilities, generates report with CVSS/CWE/OWASP standards

tools.name: numasec_assess_start
tools.description: Start an autonomous assessment in the background — returns immediately with session ID for live progress polling

tools.name: numasec_assess_status
tools.description: Get live progress and findings from a running assessment — shows new findings as they're discovered in real-time

tools.name: numasec_assess_cancel
tools.description: Cancel a running assessment and retrieve partial results collected so far

tools.name: numasec_quick_check
tools.description: 30-second security spot check — headers, technology detection, common misconfigurations. No API key required

tools.name: numasec_recon
tools.description: Port scanning + technology fingerprinting (nmap + httpx). No API key required

tools.name: numasec_http
tools.description: Security-focused HTTP requests with response analysis. Test injection payloads, check headers, probe APIs

tools.name: numasec_browser
tools.description: Playwright browser automation — navigate SPAs, fill forms with XSS payloads, take evidence screenshots

tools.name: numasec_get_knowledge
tools.description: Access 46+ security cheatsheets, attack chains, and remediation guides from the knowledge base

tools.name: create_finding
tools.description: Register a confirmed vulnerability finding with title, severity, description, and evidence

resources.description: Security knowledge base — cheatsheets, attack chains, and decision matrices for 46+ topics

prompts.name: security_assessment
prompts.description: Structured multi-step security assessment workflow — from quick check to full pentest with remediation

prompts.name: quick_security_check
prompts.description: Rapid 30-second security check with immediate recommendations
